5#ifndef CYD_UI_DRAG_N_DROP_H
6#define CYD_UI_DRAG_N_DROP_H
7
8#include <functional>
9
10namespace cydui::drag_n_drop {
11 struct draggable_t {
12 void* data = nullptr;
13
14 std::function<void(draggable_t, int, int)> drag_move = [](draggable_t, int, int) {
15 };
16 std::function<void(draggable_t, int, int)> drag_end = [](draggable_t, int, int) {
17 };
18 };
19
20 struct draggable_source_t {
21 int x = 0;
22 int y = 0;
23
24 draggable_t start_drag(int _x, int _y) {
25 draggable_t d = {
26 .drag_move = this->drag_move,
27 .drag_end = this->drag_end,
28 };
29 return drag_start(d, _x, _y);
30 }
31
32 std::function<draggable_t(draggable_t, int, int)> drag_start = [](draggable_t d, int, int) {
33 return d;
34 };
35 std::function<void(draggable_t, int, int)> drag_move = [](draggable_t, int, int) {
36 };
37 std::function<void(draggable_t, int, int)> drag_end = [](draggable_t, int, int) {
38 };
39 };
40
41 struct dragging_context_t {
42 draggable_t dragging_item {};
43 bool dragging = false;
44
45 void set_item(draggable_t item) {
46 dragging_item = item;
47 dragging = true;
48 }
49
50 void set_item_if_empty(draggable_t item) {
51 if (!dragging) set_item(std::move(item));
52 }
53 };
54}
55
56#endif //CYD_UI_DRAG_N_DROP_H
